extendedInfo.description: The most complete remote phone tracking and monitoring system for Android phones.Remotely track and monitor all SMS, MMS, text messages, calls, and GPS location.Gizmoquip SMS Tracker is the most complete remote tracking and monitoring system for Android phones.  By installing the SMS Tracker Agent on the target phone, you can remotely read all inbound and outbound SMS Text messages, MMS multimedia messages, photos sent and received, view phone call logs (including name, number, and length of call), web browsing history and view GPS location information on a map.  All phone usage information can be remotely viewed on any web browser. Parents now have a powerful took to help keep your children safe even when you canât physically see them.After installation you can remotely view the logged information at http://smstracker.comâ¢	SMS Tracking â Intercept text messages.  Read all inbound and outbound text messages.  Details include time and date, phone number, contact name and location of the target phone.  Complete Text message tracking and logging.â¢	MMS tracking - Intercept MMS multimedia messages.  Read and view all inbound and outbound MMS messages.  See what photos are sent to and from the target phone.  Details include photo, time and date, phone number, contact name and location of the target phone.â¢	Browser Tracking â monitor all web browser activity on the target phone.  Know which web sites were visited, which pages were viewed and when.  Also identifies the location of the phone every time the browser is used.â¢	GPS Tracking â view GPS location information on the map.  Using the integrated GPS Tracker, know when and where the phone is located at all times.  Breadcrumbs record location information allowing parents to locate your children at frequent intervals. You can see the complete location history of the device.  GPS logging occurs at a user defined rate ( default interval is 5 minutes ).  Remote GPS logging and viewing give you the ability to see the location of your childâs phone, from any web browser.â¢	Call Logging â Monitor all inbound, outbound and missed calls.  Identifies the phone number, contact name, call duration, and location of the phone for every call.If you want to know where your kids are, just send them a text message. The location of the phone is recorded every time it sends or receives a text message.To use SMS Tracker, install it on the device you wish to monitor and complete the registration process.  Registering the device, ties the device to the email address you supply.  After the device is registered, you will receive a confirmation email and are ready to start tracking the target phone.â¢	Tracking of System Events, including Device Powered On/Off, Device Attached / Removed to/from Charger, Apps installed/removed/updated.Unlike other monitoring solutions, SMS Tracker does not just forward a message to your phone via SMS which can cost you money, it saves the messages on a remote server that only you can access.â¢	Silently monitor all inbound and outbound SMS messages.â¢	Gizmoquip LLC is a US Based companyâ¢	Does not use SMS forwarding which can incur additional costs.â¢	Integrates with the contact data base so you know the names and the numbers of people communicating with your child.State of the art mobile tracking and monitoring is now available to every parent.  Keep your teen or pre-teen child safe at all times.

reviews.title: Great!!
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Serves it\'s purpose
reviews.author: Rio Cobbler

reviews.title: Best app ever
reviews.comment: If u pay 4$ on the smstracker website u will b able to see call logs and all text info. Accurate time and everything. Have other perks too. But all I need ia the call log and text history. Shows the ENTIRE text. Incoming and outgoing.
reviews.author: Jerimiah Cardwell

reviews.title: Its good
reviews.comment: After awhile it just stopped showing the SMS messages but worked fine in the beginning. Wont purchase anything now unless fixed then I\'ll think about it.
reviews.author: Sonya Brooks

reviews.title: muhhhh loving app
reviews.comment: i luv the app.... and thanx to all team..of this s/w made

reviews.title: I\'m reviewing spy apps...
reviews.comment: ...this one\'s not good, it has an expensive monthly subscription and doesn\'t work well even at that..
reviews.author: Jamie Lam

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: i love this app it works great because of it i caught my girlfriend cheating...i had the feeling she was she kept denying it but thanks to this app i was able to catch her txting this dude and sending him naked pics caught rite handed....jst want to say thanks to the development team for a great app
reviews.author: Arthur Weah

reviews.title: It\'s Great but..
reviews.comment: I think this is a great and efficient app. The only problem I have with this app is you have to install in the phone you want to track which makes perfect sense. What I don\'t get it why does it make itself visible on that phone? The person could easily find it and uninstall it if they wanted to. So it defeats the whole purpose of what it is set to do...
reviews.author: Ahailia St John

reviews.title: Terrible invasion of privacy
reviews.comment: Anybody that installs this on another persons phone to spy on them is a morally bankrupt piece of crap. Not to mention that it slows down your entire device to the point where it\'s crashing constantly. All that you people are doing is enabling big brother. Enjoy bringing your loved ones up in a police state!
reviews.author: Jimmy Robert

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Great app but I still don\'t understand how to use it, how do I get this app to monitor my gf\'s phone??? At the moment it only monitors my phone even though that is still pretty cool lol...
reviews.author: michael barker

reviews.title: I hate it
reviews.comment: I hate it i\'m trying to see if my dad and this idiot woman or dating but it wont show it is a stupid app
reviews.author: alicia hallock

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Love this app caught spouse texting other men, Highly recommended if you have any questions or concerns about your significant other.
reviews.author: scot forte

reviews.title: Hmm
reviews.comment: Got that app liked it for a few Days and Now its Messing up -__- it Doesn\'t get all the SMS my bf recieves no matter how many times I refresh. but then again, you get what u paid for which was nothing. So 2 stars for the free app. Ill continue to look for better
reviews.author: crystal miles

reviews.title: Avg..
reviews.comment: Text and info works..but gps is horrible...i bought the full package...again gps takes a day to catch up
reviews.author: Brion Tommet

reviews.title: Pigeon problem
reviews.comment: This seems like an amazing app but there\'s no possible way to use this with my sons.  I know how to hide the app within the phone, but the reality is there is a pigeon that shows up in the notification bar saying \"sms tracker is active\" every time it\'s activated, so really it\'s not nearly as covert as they try to sell it as being
reviews.author: Ray Lewie

reviews.title: Messages not found
reviews.comment: Ive checked the messages on PC while my device is being selected but no messages have been found. What should I do?
reviews.author: Kenneth Rangas

reviews.comment: How do you set it up to see another phone number text messages. I can only see my text. And they can\'t find out correct?

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I habe downloaded this app long time ago and tested it on my last phone it really worked...now I have downloaded it on my gf\'s phone because she is staying and hanging out with her ex bfs and I dont feel uncomfortable after I have seen some messages from ex\'s...so I guess after I took her phone in front of her and sae it because she first asked for my phone...from now she is going to be more careful but to late baby lmao this app is excellent Thank you developing team
